creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund; purchase from the collection of Elizabeth and Willard Clark
description: unsigned; man wearing massive robes seated on low podium behind partially closed screen; arrangement of robes and tall black hat give figure triangular appearance
inscription: Inscription on top half: 後鳥羽院御製；　立田姫；　風のしらべも；　こゑたてつ；　秋やきぬらん；　岡のべの里；｛Gotoba-in Gyosei; Tatsuta-Hime Kaze no shirabe mo koetatetsu; Aki yakinuran Okanobe no sato}(Written by His Highness Gotoba-in, The wind gives voice to its song; Fall approaches the village by the hill.)
title: Retired Emperor Gotoba
